DOC.brief_summary: The project team developped and validated a French patient-based health-related quality of life instrument in kidney transplant: the QoL Retrans. The aim of the study is to determine the minimum significant change of the valdiated tool: ReTransQol
DOC.brief_title: For a Better Interpretation of Quality of Life Scores of Kidney Transplant Patients: Determination of the Minimum Significant Change RetransQol
DOC.criteria: Patient with a transplant kidney Patient not able to answer survey
